plot: Pete Smiley, a shoemaker, is in the habit of coming home from his night haunts and cronies pretty late, and with a twenty-two carat jag. He also indulges in booze fighting in the day-time. ...
title: The Magic Shoes
plot_es: Pete Smiley, a shoemaker, is in the habit of coming home from his night haunts and cronies pretty late, and with a twenty-two carat jag. He also indulges in booze fighting in the day-time. ...
plot_en: Pete Smiley, a shoemaker, is in the habit of coming home from his night haunts and cronies pretty late, and with a twenty-two carat jag. He also indulges in booze fighting in the day-time. ...
